description: This file sets up an agent with a reasoning model to solve the classic missionaries and cannibals puzzle using deep seek reasoning and OpenAI's GPT-4 model.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that combines a reasoning model and a language model to perform tasks.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: A reasoning model designed for deep search and inference tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A wrapper for OpenAI's chat models, such as GPT-4.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response generated by the agent, possibly streaming output.
